content.description: Scramble left uphill on the left side of the dome to some blocky features with cracks. Climb up placing gear in the cracks and make some spooky moves over the crux bulge with your gear a ways below. Continue up the face on big holds up the arete/face to the trees above.
content.protection: Standard Rack, Rap from trees above

content.description: Start on the face just right of the blocky overhanging section of the dome. Climb the face up to a right leaning groove at the top. Follow the groove and finish up to the trees above.

Scramble up a gully on the right side of the dome. Climb up the groove on the right edge of the dome placing gear when possible along the way. The climb is juggy and enjoyable. Finish at the trees on top.
content.protection: Standard Rack, rap from trees or walk off

content.description: Start at the hand crack 15' left of Garlough's Groove. Climb the crack until it ends (crux) and continue up the face/groove above. Hard to describe it, all the features look the same. Finish at the trees on top.

Start the same as Sundown on the left side of The Dome. Climb up just left of Sundown. Stay left of the steep bulge and follow the slab on jugs. Go left or right of a large block/flake at half height and continue up easy jug slab to the top. Walk off left or rap.
content.protection: Standard Rack. Few gear options along the way.
content.location: Very left side of The Dome

content.description: The Dome is located at the far right end of the crag. The climbing is moderate but very fun and the views are killer from the top. Watch out for poison ivy on the hillside getting over to it.
